All, I am looking to deschipher this Kanji ?????. I believe is says 
Honami Mitsuyama ???, it is from a book I have just picked up written in 
1965. I believe it is a limited edition ( 1000 copies ) and has I think 
many oshigata in it. I cannot make out the title and I am waiting for it 
to arrive so I will get better scans of it in the near future.

Does anyone know of this member of the Honami family, if he is/was one ? 
and do you know what this book may be.

If this kanji does not work on this listserve, I can email it to you.

Rich
